feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.24
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Cache busting for react after self-update
  • Fixes for $0 subscriptions
  • Add auth guard for activity records
  • v5.10.24 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9911

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.23...v5.10.24

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.25
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for ZUGFeRD by @LarsK1 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9914
  • Update translations by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9912
  • Fix for calculate taxes with Recurring Invoices by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9918
  • Purchase Order Accept Webhook by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9923
  • Feature/import quickbooks by @karneaud in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9917
  • Translations by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9924
  • feat: Add YunoHost to self-hosted options by @CodeShakingSheep in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9931
  • Fixes for inter EU tax rules by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9934
  • v5.10.25 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9935

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.24...v5.10.25

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.26
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • v5.10.26 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9937
  • Fixes for custom fields that use switches - ensure output = yes/no

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.25...v5.10.26

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.27
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Added Elestio as one-click deploy option by @kaiwalyakoparkar in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9921
  • Sort filters for expense.payment_date by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9942
  • Rotessa: New payment flow by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9945
  • Minor fixes. by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9948
  • Add reversal for failed BTC payments by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9960
  • Updates for template service properties
  • Fixes for confirming gateway fees
  • Set blank string for signature date
  • Remove paypal express, omnipay
  • v5.10.27 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9969

New Contributors

  • @kaiwalyakoparkar made their first contribution in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9921

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.26...v5.10.27

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.28
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes when previewing purchase order designs from invoice design view
  • Customization of Payment Failed Email Template
  • Fixes for GoCardless Instant Bank Payment
  • Updates for Forte CSG
  • E-Invoice: Payment means code can only contain credit transfer codes by @arnebr in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9988
  • New payment flow @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9994
  • Feature: inbound email expenses & mindee ocr by @paulwer in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9042
  • CBA Powerboard Payment Driver by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10001
  • Blockonomics BTC Payment Driver in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10012

New Contributors

  • @arnebr made their first contribution in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9988

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.27...v5.10.28
